srednow7 Welcome to srednow7! What would you like to do? New game Continue last game Help \? Load… Would you like to load your last saved game? Yes No Add Player Remove Player Human AI OK A B Hand Trade Wonder Summary Score East West Passing direction: %s %s (not built) + -
I'm using an admittedly odd syntax for colored strings in which *COLOR-text* will apply a color to a text. !--> Setup Play with 3–7 AI or Human players. Each player will be to the West of the previous one. Select a Wonder Side Select the side of the wonder to use. If unsure, side A is typically better for beginners. Wonder These are the cards you have already built. They contribute to your production or victory points. Summary *GOLD-Gold* is used to trade for resources from other players. *RESOURCE-Resources* and *INDUSTRY-industries* (*WOOD-wood*, *STONE-stone*, *CLAY-clay*, *ORE-ore*, *CLOTH-cloth*, *GLASS-glass*, and *PAPER-paper*) are used to build cards. *SCIENCE-Scientific products* (*COMPASS-compass*, *GEAR-gear*, and *TABLET-tablet*) contribute to the *SCIENCE-scientific* victory points at the end of the game. Victory points (*VP-vp*) contribute directly to your score at the end of the game. At the end of each era, the army (*SHIELD-shield*) battles the armies of the neighboring nations, awarding or subtracting *MILITARY-military* victory points.
Hand Each turn you either build a card, build a wonder stage, or discard a card for 3 *GOLD-gold*. Trade Trade for resources from your neighbors to build cards. Score *MILITARY-Military* points come from *MILITARY-military* victories. In era 1, 1 point is awarded. In era 2, 3. In era 3, 5. Defeats are subtracted from victories. The *GOLD-gold* score is the ending amount of *GOLD-gold* divided by 3, rounded down. *STAGE-Wonder* points come from building the *STAGE-wonder*. *STRUCTURE-Structure* points come from *STRUCTURE-civilian structures*. *COMMERCIAL-Commerce* points are from *COMMERCIAL-commercial structures*. *GUILD-Guild* points come from *GUILD-guilds*. *SCIENCE-Science* points are awarded by 7 points for each complete set of the three *SCIENCE-science* products, plus the square of the number of each *SCIENCE-science* product.
